title: Why doesn't the screen turn on when I double touch the screen?
answer:
Make sure the Double touch switch is turned on in Settings > Motion control > Double touch. If it is turned on, make sure you double touch correctly according. Note the following: 

  The area within 1 cm from the edge of the screen does not recognize touches. 

  The interval between touches must not exceed 500 ms. 

  The distance between touches must not exceed 5 mm. 

  Don't try to turn on the screen in this way immediately after locking the screen. The screen only recognizes your touches 800 ms after turning off. 

  When double touching, make sure not to block the light sensor. If you block or touch near the light sensor, your touches will not be recognized.
